script_text: Taurus, April is your month of transformation. The solar eclipse on the 8th shakes up your hidden sector—secrets will be revealed. Career-wise, stay steady until the 20th when the Sun enters your sign, bringing financial rewards. Love is intense; avoid arguments near the 15th. Trust your gut this month, it is your strongest ally.
title: Taurus Monthly Forecast - Secrets Revealed! ♉
